name: Paws Of Justice
description:
In Paws of Justice you gain the ultimate ability to inverse world. It means that you can turn the world up side down and explore level from different point of view!

After a failed alchemical experiment, a demon named Shell was released from his cell world and, in his pursuit of chaos, distorted the laboratory of the protagonist, Ay.

--- Team --- Developers: 
  • Ivan Babanov - ibdray.dev@gmail.com
  • Daniil Gushchin - danil7887@gmail.com
  • Pavel Medvedev - phenangelos@gmail.com
3D artists: 
  • Aleksey Trubnikov - trubnikoff.a@gmail.com
  • Nadeghda Chernigovskay - Isilmire@gmail.com
--- Controls ---
  • WASD - Movement (Forward, Left, Backwards, Right) 
  • R - Inverse world
  • Space Bar - Jump, double jump
  • E - Interact
  • Shift - Sprint 
  • L. Alt - Walk   
--- Content created before the jam ---
  • Twinmotion Materials - Bricks, metal, parquet, concrete, rubber, carpet and rough planks.
  • Houdini - UE Starter Kit's rocks, pipes and edge damage tool.
  • Neocity - Crate and bar shelf's.
  • Glowing spheres from Poker (https://ib-dray.itch.io/poker)
  • Pillars and barrels, created by Nadeghda Chernigovskay
  • Chandeliers

All other assets, such as static meshes, character models, animations, gameplay logic and music was created during jam by authors.

  • Game Producer - Ivan Babanov
  • Main character's logic - Ivan Babanov
  • Traps and level mechanisms - Pavel Medvedev
  • Ay's model - Nadeghda Chernigovskaya
  • Shell's model - Aleksey Trubnikov
  • All of both character's animations - Aleksey Trubnikov
  • Beautiful game models - Nadeghda Chernigovskaya, Aleksey Trubnikov
  • Level desing -  Ivan Babanov, Daniil Gushchin
  • Ay's room and Gallery - Pavel Medvedev
  • Main area - Ivan Babanov with support of Daniil Gushchin
  • Sound Design and Music - Daniil Gushchin
  • VFX - Pavel Medvedev with support of Ivan Babanov
